DOC.brief_summary: Basal ganglia are involved in the control of motor, cognitive and emotional behaviours. The aim of this study is to precisely evaluate patients with basal ganglia focal lesions both with or without loss of psychic-self activation.
DOC.brief_title: Clinical, Neurophysiological and Radiological Evaluation of Patients With Basal Ganglia Lesions
DOC.criteria: Basal ganglia lesions Contraindication to magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) Dementia
